column2: ENGLISH
Show Elector Titles of the [emf_global_hre.GetFullName]

Sometimes keeping track of the Prince-Electors of the [emf_global_hre.GetFullName] is hard enough, but if you want to know which titles are the actual Elector Titles, then that can be quite a challenge as the game progresses. If you wanted to, e.g., become a Prince-Elector yourself, you'd definitely need to know the titles after which you were aiming. View it all easily right here.
Show Elector Titles of the [emf_global_hre.GetFullName]

Sometimes keeping track of the Prince-Electors of the [emf_global_hre.GetFullName] is hard enough, but if you want to know which titles are the actual Elector Titles, then that can be quite a challenge as the game progresses. If you wanted to, e.g., become a Prince-Elector yourself, you'd definitely need to know the titles after which you were aiming. View it all easily right here.

As the [emf_former_elector_title.GetFullName] had fallen irredeemably from the lawful dominion of the [emf_global_hre.GetFullName], the question of whom upon which its electorate should be conferred had arisen among the peers of the [emf_global_hre.EMF_GetEmpireReich].\n\nAfter much discussion and debate, a consensus has largely been reached that the holder of the [emf_new_elector_title.GetFullName] shall become an Elector in perpetuity. [emf_new_elector.GetTitledFirstName] of the House [emf_new_elector.GetOnlyDynastyName], by reason of [emf_new_elector.GetPossPronoun] standing and the prestige of [emf_new_elector.GetPossPronoun] house among the great princes of the realm, stands foremost among those worthy to receive the right and privilege to elect the [emf_global_hre.GetRulerTitle] of the Romans.

As the [emf_former_elector_title.GetFullName] had fallen irredeemably from the lawful dominion of the [emf_global_hre.GetFullName], the question of whom upon which its electorate should be conferred had arisen among the peers of the [emf_global_hre.EMF_GetEmpireReich].\n\nAfter much discussion and debate, a consensus has largely been reached that the holder of the [emf_new_elector_title.GetFullName] shall become an Elector in perpetuity. [emf_new_elector.GetTitledFirstName], by reason of [emf_new_elector.GetPossPronoun] standing amongst the ecclesiastical princes of the realm, stands foremost among those worthy to represent the will of [emf_new_elector.Religion.GetHighGodName] in the election of the [emf_global_hre.GetRulerTitle] of the Romans.

With the [emf_former_elector_title.GetFullName][emf_losing_elector.EMF_hre_65_GetElectorTitleLoserPhrase] falling into the demesne of the Elector [emf_gaining_elector.GetTitledName], [emf_former_elector_title.GetName] could no longer remain part of the [emf_global_hre.EMF_GetEmpireReich]'s electorate without sacrificing its integrity.\n\nAfter much discussion and careful negotiation among the peers of the [emf_global_hre.EMF_GetEmpireReich], a consensus has largely been reached that the holder of the [emf_new_elector_title.GetFullName] shall become an Elector in perpetuity. [emf_new_elector.GetTitledFirstName] of the House [emf_new_elector.GetOnlyDynastyName], by reason of [emf_new_elector.GetPossPronoun] standing and the prestige of [emf_new_elector.GetPossPronoun] house among the great princes of the realm, stands foremost among those worthy to receive the right and privilege to elect the [emf_global_hre.GetRulerTitle] of the Romans.

With the [emf_former_elector_title.GetFullName][emf_losing_elector.EMF_hre_65_GetElectorTitleLoserPhrase] falling into the demesne of the Elector [emf_gaining_elector.GetTitledName], [emf_former_elector_title.GetName] could no longer remain part of the [emf_global_hre.EMF_GetEmpireReich]'s electorate without sacrificing its integrity.\n\nAfter much discussion and careful negotiation among the peers of the [emf_global_hre.EMF_GetEmpireReich], a consensus has largely been reached that the holder of the [emf_new_elector_title.GetFullName] shall become an Elector in perpetuity. With the disestablishment of the [emf_former_elector_title.GetFullName], the question of whom upon which its electorate should be conferred had arisen among the peers of the [emf_global_hre.EMF_GetEmpireReich].\n\nAfter much discussion and debate, a consensus has largely been reached that the holder of the [emf_new_elector_title.GetFullName] shall become an Elector in perpetuity. [emf_new_elector.GetTitledFirstName] of the House [emf_new_elector.GetOnlyDynastyName], by reason of [emf_new_elector.GetPossPronoun] standing and the prestige of [emf_new_elector.GetPossPronoun] house among the great princes of the realm, stands foremost among those worthy to receive the right and privilege to elect the [emf_global_hre.GetRulerTitle] of the Romans.

A decree will be prepared to extend the electorate to the §Y[emf_new_elector_title.GetFullName]§!, held by §Y[emf_new_elector.GetTitledFirstName]§!, and all of [emf_new_elector.GetPossPronoun] successors in perpetuity.
As the peers have willed, I too declare it so.
It has been rightly decided.
Such a common cur does not deserve the dignity of an electorate!
